titleStmt.title: Lusty Fryer of Flanders; how in a nunnery at the city of Gaunt this Fryer got thirty nuns with child in three weeks time, and afterwards made his escape. To the tune of, Cold and raw.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Not long ago from hence I went ..."
Imperfect: trimmed, affecting imprint and text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
